name: Mundo Atómico - Pulqui 2
description: For the 70th Anniversary of the Public and Free Universities, Videogames Degree in Universidad Nacional de José C. Paz, with Quincho Games colaboration, developed a mini game for the show "Ciencia del Pueblo: Revista Mundo Atómico". Mundo Atómico was a science argentine magazine, released from 1950 to 1955, and some of their articles were about Pulqui 2, a plane built in Argentina.
